import './null.scss'; import './drawer.scss'; export const Drawer = ({ onClose, items }) => { {JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('drawerItems')).length != 0 ? items = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('drawerItems')) : items = []} return (

Корзина

{items.map(({ img, name, price, }) => (

{name}

{price} руб.

))}
Итого:
Цена
) }
